title: About CNPJfy
subtitle: A free and open source platform for Brazilian business data queries

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: Democratize access to Brazilian business information by providing a free, fast and reliable platform for CNPJ data queries.
mission.description2: We believe that public information should be accessible to everyone, without financial or technical barriers. That's why we keep CNPJfy as a 100% free and open source project.

updatedData.title: Updated Data
updatedData.description: Information always updated directly from the Federal Revenue

free.title: Completely Free
free.description: No limits, no registration, no hidden costs

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Open and transparent code for the entire community

dataSource.title: Data Source
dataSource.description: All data is obtained directly from public files made available by the Federal Revenue of Brazil, ensuring authenticity and constant updating of information.

support.title: Support the Project
support.description: CNPJfy is maintained by volunteers and depends on the community to continue operating. You can help in several ways:

license.text: This project is licensed under the
license.madeWith: Made with ❤️ for the Brazilian community
